title: Endings Guide
content:
soul if you are willing to leave the mortal realms and return with her, to Elysium. You will get the following choices:

Perhaps one day, but for now, there's more I need to accomplish./ Being an Illithid has its advantages. I'm content as I am. I crave nothing more. Take me to Elysium.

Choose the 3rd option here, and Mystra will accept you once more. This will result in Mystra making you her Chosen, once more.

All Karlach Endings in Baldur's Gate 3
